articles.author: Scott Chipolina
articles.title: Coinbase trading volumes fall as regulatory uncertainty weighs - Financial Times
articles.description: Nasdaq-listed exchange sues SEC as it seeks more clarity on crypto regulations
articles.content: Coinbase has suffered a further drop in trading volumes even though the price of bitcoin has rallied, raising the stakes for the exchange as it tries to fend off a probe from the US markets regulator… [+2980 chars]
